sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { extent, scaleLinear } from 'd3' import axios from 'axios' function States() { const [dump, dFunc] = useState(), w = 600, h = 600, margin = { top: 40, right: 40, bottom: 40, left: 40 }, width = w - margin.right - margin.left, height = h - margin.top - margin.bottom, ref = useRef(null), xScale = null, yScale = null useEffect(() => { axios .get('https://api.coindesk.com/v1/bpi/historical/close.json') .then((res) => { dFunc(Object.keys(res.data["bpi"]).map((key) => { return { x: key, y: res.data["bpi"][key] } })) xScale = scaleLinear() .domain(extent(dump, d => d.x)) .range([0, width]) yScale = scaleLinear() .domain(extent(dump, d => d.y)) .range([height, 0]) }) .catch((e) => console.log(e)) }, []) return (

{JSON.stringify(dump)}

 ) } export default States
